help.description: Display a list of available commands or get help for a specific command.

latency.description: Show the client's ping in milliseconds.

create.description: Initialize yourself in the database, required in order to use most of the economy commands.

bal.description: Show your balance or someone else's.

mine.description: One way of earning money, you get low, medium, and high grade copper.

beg.description: Beg for money. you get low and medium grade copper.

gamble.description:
Gamble away your copper, not much else to be said.
Winnings are double your bet. If you lose, you just lose your bet.

give.description: Give a user some of your copper.

ask.description:
Ask Ea-Nasir a question, or have a discussion. Powered by AI.
If you reply to a message previously sent by Ea-Nasir, he will take that message into context.

rps.description:
Play rock, paper, scissors against Ea-Nasir. You can bet if you want.
Unlike gambling, your winnings are NOT doubled.

lb.description: Show the leaderboard across all of Discord.
lb.usage: lb [type: default is high; 'all' is available]

convert.description: Pretty self-explanatory, convert from one grade of copper to another.

reset.description: For economy moderators, reset a trader's balance or just a certain grade.

delete.description: For the bot owner, delete a user from the database.
